downloadTitle: Microsoft eCommerce Solutions: Overview of Microsoft's Commerce-Related Systems
downloadDescription: PUBLISHED January 2003. Internally, Microsoft has implemented several commerce-related systems in the areas of corporate purchasing, value chain operations, financial services, direct marketing, selling, and service.
detailsSection: Internally, Microsoft has implemented several commerce-related systems in the areas of corporate purchasing, value chain operations, financial services, direct marketing, selling, and service.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
